name: Bulb Head
description:
Bulb Head is a 4-players coop Vampire Survivor's game in which you play Cowboy lightBulbs that lost their heird.

- LightBulbs need energy to survive

- They can plug into energy sources or can plug to each other to share energy

- They shoot light to stun sheeps to collect them and turn them into resources to trad for more powerful equipment

- The Art direction was inspired by Toem.

We focused on the multiplayer part with quantum and lost track of time for gameplay integration. Nice to test the tech though !
